pullrequest.title: Fuel: List models by owner on insert menu

content.raw:
I think this is super cool but we should also consider the usability aspects of this design. For example, I like dropping files from my computer onto google drive instead of going through the file browser dialog but what if I could easily find my files in the left panel of the browser? 

I am leaning towards keeping the fuel menu \(in addition to this cool drag-and-drop feature\), and have a search bar for finding models inside gazebo.
content.html:
I think this is super cool but we should also consider the usability aspects of this design. For example, I like dropping files from my computer onto google drive instead of going through the file browser dialog but what if I could easily find my files in the left panel of the browser?

I am leaning towards keeping the fuel menu (in addition to this cool drag-and-drop feature), and have a search bar for finding models inside gazebo.
